content:
# The error indicates that there is no coal available in my inventory to insert into the stone furnace. 
# This means I need to gather coal first before I can fuel the furnace and start smelting stones into stone bricks.

# Let's locate the nearest coal resource and harvest some coal. 
# I will gather a sufficient amount of coal to ensure I can fuel the furnace adequately.

move_to(nearest(Resource.Coal))  # Move to the nearest coal resource location.
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Coal), quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 units of coal from the nearest coal resource.
